#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	char s[1000];
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t){
		cin.ignore();
		cin.getline(s,1000);
		int word=1;
		for (int i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++)
			if(s[i]==' ')
				word++;
		cout<<word<<endl;

		t--;
	}
	return 0;
}
